title: FS-T206 Frank Chance Red Portrait SGC 1

posts.post_title: FS-T206 Frank Chance Red Portrait SGC 1
posts.post_content:
An opportunity own a Red Chance with good centering and nice eye appeal at an affordable price 

No paper loss, however SGC decided the thin creasing was worthy of a 1 grade recently slabbed 

Will deliver Priority Mail for $375 via PPFF

Thanks
Wayne
